1.descricao:
Nevinyrral's Disk enters the battlefield tapped.

{1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

regras.texto: Creatures can be regenerated although the Auras on the creatures will still be destroyed by the Disk.

The destruction of the Disk is not a sacrifice. It is destroyed as part of the resolution if it is still on the battlefield. If an effect gives Nevinyrral's Disk indestructible or regenerates it, it won't be destroyed by its ability.

2.descricao: Other Goblin creatures get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
2.texto: To be king, Numsgil did in Blog, who did in Unkful, who did in Viddle, who did in Loll, who did in Alrok... .

regras.texto: Goblin King now has the Goblin creature type and its ability has been reworded to affect *other* Goblins. This means that if two Goblin Kings are on the battlefield, each gives the other a bonus.

3.descricao: {2}{R}, Sacrifice two Goblins: Put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
3.texto: "Goblins bred underground, their numbers hidden from the enemy until it was too late." -Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV

regras.texto: The token Goblins can be sacrificed to the Warrens to generate new Goblins.

4.descricao:
Flying

Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
4.texto: Speed and fire are always a deadly combination.

5.descricao:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.
5.texto: Unlike previous conflicts, the war between Urza and Mishra made Dominia itself a casualty of war.

6.texto: "I do not remember what he said to her. I remember her fiery eyes, fixed upon him for an instant. I remember a flash, and the hot breath of sudden flames made me turn away. When I looked again, Angus was gone." -A Wayfarer, on meeting Lady Orca

7.descricao:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)
7.texto: "Battle doesn't need a purpose; the battle is its own purpose. You don't ask why a plague spreads or a field burns. Don't ask why I fight."

8.descricao:
Flying

Whenever Hypnotic Specter deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random.

regras.texto: The ability triggers even if the Specter's damage is being redirected to an opponent. It does not trigger if damage that would have been dealt to the opponent is redirected to a nonopponent player or a creature, or if the damage is prevented.

9.descricao:
Protection from white

{B}: Knight of Stromgald gains first strike until end of turn.

{B}{B}: Knight of Stromgald gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

10.texto: "Ihsan, the weak. Ihsan, the fallen. Ihsan, the betrayer. He has brought shame to the Serra Paladins where none existed before. May his suffering equal his betrayal." -Baris, Serra inquisitor

11.descricao: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.
11.texto: "From up here we can drop rocks and arrows and more rocks!" "Uh, yeah boss, but how do we get down?"

regras.texto: You can activate the ability repeatedly during a turn. This generally has no additional effect, unless some other effect (like that from Adarkar Windform has caused it to lose flying since the last time the ability resolved.

For flying to work as an evasion ability, an attacking Goblin Balloon Brigade's ability must be activated before the declare blockers step begins. Once Goblin Balloon Brigade has become blocked, giving it flying won't change that.

12.descricao:
Trample

Goblin Mutant can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater.

Goblin Mutant can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.

13.descricao: Put X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

regras.texto: The tokens are named "Goblin" and are of creature type "Goblin".
X can be zero.

14.descricao: When Goblin Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of Goblin cards and reveal those cards. Shuffle your library, then put them on top of it in any order.

regras.texto: You can search for any card with the creature type Goblin, including Creature or Tribal cards. Older cards of type "Summon Goblin" and "Summon Goblins" also count. You can't search for cards that have Goblin in the name but don't have the creature type Goblin.

15.descricao:
Whenever Goblin Snowman blocks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by it this turn.

{T}: Goblin Snowman deals 1 damage to target creature it's blocking.
15.texto: "Strength in numbers? Right." -Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

16.descricao:
You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay Pyrokinesis's mana cost.

Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

regras.texto: You can't do fractional points of damage.
The number of targets must be at least 1 and at most 4. You divide the damage as you cast Pyrokinesis, not as it resolves. Each target must be assigned at least 1 damage.

17.texto: "Oi oi oi, me gotta hurt in 'ere,/ Oi oi oi, me smell a ting is near,/ Gonna bosh 'n gonna nosh/ 'n da hurt'll disappear." -Troll chant

19.texto: "A fine example of the rewards of artifice: a thoroughly obedient steed with wings of Soldevi steel." -Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist

20.descricao:
Polluted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

regras.texto: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

21.descricao:
Smoldering Crater enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

regras.texto: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

22.descricao: {T}: Cuombajj Witches deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to target creature or player of an opponent's choice.

regras.texto: In multiplayer games you can choose a different opposing player each time it is used. You also don't have to choose the same player that you targeted with the effect (or whose creature you targeted).
If either target becomes invalid, the other one is still affected.
Both targets are chosen on activation, but you choose your target before the opponent chooses.
The two targets can be the same.

23.texto: "Could there be a fouler act? No doubt the baron knows of one." -Autumn Willow

24.descricao: Target player discards two cards at random.

25.descricao: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

27.descricao:
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.

Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

regras.texto: The additional cost is paid when you pay the rest of Fireball's costs, even though that text appears second on the card (to make the card easier to read). The additional cost doesn't count toward Fireball's converted mana cost.

If, for example, X is 5 and you choose three target creatures, Fireball has a total cost of {7}{R} (even though its mana cost is just {5}{R}). If those creatures are all still legal targets as Fireball resolves, it deals 1 damage to each of them.
You may cast Fireball with zero targets, regardless of the value chosen for X. If you do so, it will not be a targeted spell, and no damage will actually be dealt when it resolves.
Fireball's damage is divided as Fireball resolves, not as it's cast, because there are no choices involved. The division involves only targets that are still legal at that time.
You can target more than X creatures. However, if the number of legal targets at the time Fireball resolves is greater than X, none of them will be dealt any damage.

28.descricao: {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Digging Team: Destroy target Wall.
28.texto: "From down here we can make the whole wall collapse!" "Uh, yeah, boss, but how do we get out?"

29.descricao:
As an additional cost to cast Goblin Grenade, sacrifice a Goblin.

Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to target creature or player.
29.texto: "I don't suppose we could teach them to throw the cursed things?' -Ivra Jursdotter

regras.texto: You can't sacrifice more than one Goblin to get a greater effect.
Players can only respond once Goblin Grenade has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try and destroy the Goblin to prevent you from casting Goblin Grenade.
The Goblin you sacrifice to cast Goblin Grenade doesn't have to be a creature. For example, you could sacrifice Boggart Shenanigans (a tribal enchantment with the subtype Goblin).

30.texto: "When you're a goblin, you don't have to step forward to be a hero-everyone else just has to step back!" -Biggum Flodrot, goblin veteran

31.descricao: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

regras.texto: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.

You can search for any card with the creature type Goblin, including Creature or Tribal cards. Older cards of type "Summon Goblin" and "Summon Goblins" also count. You can't search for cards that have Goblin in the name but don't have the creature type Goblin.

32.descricao: {R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact. That artifact deals damage equal to its converted mana cost to Goblin Tinkerer.
32.texto: "Can they do that?" -Imwita, Zhalfirin artificer, last words

33.descricao: Whenever Goblin Vandal attacks and isn't blocked, you may pay {R}. If you do, destroy target artifact defending player controls and Goblin Vandal assigns no combat damage this turn.

regras.texto: If the defending player controls no artifacts that you can target, the ability doesn't go on the stack and you can't pay {R}.

An ability that triggers when something "attacks and isn't blocked" triggers in the declare blockers step after blockers are declared if (1) that creature is attacking and (2) no creatures are declared to block it. It will trigger even if that creature was put onto the battlefield attacking rather than having been declared as an attacker in the declare attackers step.

34.descricao: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

35.descricao: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
35.texto: "I got it! I got it! I-"

36.descricao: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
36.texto: They'll attack whatever's in front of them-as long as you tell them where that is.

regras.texto: Mogg Flunkies can be declared as an attacker only if another creature is declared as an attacker at the same time. Similarly, Mogg Flunkies can be declared as a blocker only if another creature is declared as a blocker at the same time.
Two or more Mogg Flunkies can attack or block together.

Although Mogg Flunkies can't attack alone, the other attacking creature(s) doesn't have to attack the same player or planeswalker. For example, Mogg Flunkies could attack an opponent and another creature could attack a planeswalker that opponent controls.

In a Two-Headed Giant game (or in another format using the shared team turns option), Mogg Flunkies can attack or block with a creature controlled by your teammate, even if no other creatures you control are attacking or blocking.

37.descricao: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
37.texto: The evisceration of one mogg always cheers up the rest.

38.descricao: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
38.texto: "Hi! ni! ya! Behold the man of flint, that's me! Four lightnings zigzag from me, strike and return." -Navajo war chant

regras.texto: You can assign damage to multiple targets and are not forced to assign the same amount of damage to each target.
You can't do fractional points of damage.
The number of targets must be at least 1 and at most 4. You divide the damage as you cast Pyrokinesis, not as it resolves. Each target must be assigned at least 1 damage.

39.descricao: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
39.texto: Charging alone takes uncommon daring or uncommon stupidity. Or both.

44.descricao:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Brushland deals 1 damage to you.

45.descricao: First strike, forestwalk, vigilance (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike, it can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

47.descricao:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sacred Mesa unless you sacrifice a Pegasus.

{1}{W}: Put a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
47.texto: "Do not go there, do not go/ unless you rise on wings, unless you walk on hooves." -'Song to the Sun,' Femeref song

regras.texto: It can be used during upkeep to create a Pegasus token in time for it to be sacrificed.

48.descricao:
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

{T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

regras.texto: The current power/toughness being 1/1 is a targeting requirement so it is checked when announcing and again right before resolving.

49.descricao: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
49.texto: This timeworn relic was responsible for many of Urza's victories, though he never fully comprehended its mystical runes.

50.texto: "The path of least resistance will seldom lead you beyond your doorstep." -Oracle en-Vec

51.descricao: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep.

regras.texto: In multiplayer games you can choose a different player's creature each upkeep. You are forced to pick a creature that some opponent controls if there is at least one creature on the battlefield that is a legal target.
If you have more than one Djinn, you can have all of them target the same creature with their ability.
If there are no creatures your opponent controls to target at the beginning of your upkeep, ignore this ability.

52.descricao: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.
52.texto: "The raging winds..., settling on the sea, the surges, the sweep,/ Raise liquid mountains, and disclose the deep." -Virgil, Aeneid, Book I, trans. Dryden

regras.texto: Whether or not a creature has flying is only checked on resolution.

53.descricao: Whenever Spectral Bears attacks, if defending player controls no black nontoken permanents, it doesn't untap during your next untap step.
53.texto: "I hear there are Bears-or spirits-that guard caravans passing through the forest" -Gulsen, abbey matron

regras.texto: The checks for black cards is made both at the time you declare attackers and as the ability resolves. If there are any at the time attackers are declared, it won't trigger at all. If there are any at the time it resolves, the ability will do nothing.

54.descricao: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
54.texto: "You want to know your eemy? Look at your feet while you trample him." -Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

regras.texto: Overrun affects only creatures you control at the time it resolves. It won't affect creatures that come under your control later in the turn.

55.descricao:
Protection from black

{W}: Order of the White Shield gains first strike until end of turn.

{W}{W}: Order of the White Shield gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
55.texto: A shield of light admits no shadow.

56.descricao:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
56.texto: "The clouds came alive and dove to the earth! Hooves flashed among the dark army, who fled before the spectacle of fury." -Song of All, canto 211

57.descricao:
Flying

Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
57.texto: Born with wings of light and a sword of faith, this heavenly incarnation embodies both fury and purity.

58.descricao: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

regras.texto: If the creature has a negative power, the player does not lose life. It acts the same as if it had a power of zero.
The amount of life that's gained is equal to the power of the targeted creature as it last existed on the battlefield.

59.descricao:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
59.texto: Out of the blackness and stench of the engulfing swamp emerged a shimmering figure. Only the splattered armor and ichor-stained sword hinted at the unfathomable evil the Knight had just laid waste.

60.descricao:
Buyback—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)

Put a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

61.descricao:
Drifting Meadow enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

regras.texto: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

62.descricao:
Slippery Karst enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

regras.texto: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

63.descricao:
Serrated Arrows enters the battlefield with three arrowhead counters on it.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it.

{T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

regras.texto: The upkeep trigger checks the number of counters at the start of upkeep, and only goes on the stack if there are no arrowhead counters at that time. It will check again on resolution, and will do nothing if you've somehow manage to get a new arrowhead counter on the Arrows.

64.descricao: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
64.texto: "We know our place in the cycle of life-and it is not as flies." -Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

regras.texto: This card now uses the Reach keyword ability to enable the blocking of flying creatures. This works because a creature with flying can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach.

65.texto: "It had a mouth like that of a great beast, and gnashed its teeth as it strained to reach us. I am thankful it possessed no means of locomotion." -Vervamon the Elder

66.descricao: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

67.descricao: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
67.texto: While it possesses potent venom, the Giant Spider often chooses not to paralyze its victims. Perhaps the creature enjoys the gentle rocking motion caused by its captives' struggles to escape its web.

regras.texto: This card now uses the Reach keyword ability to enable the blocking of flying creatures. This works because a creature with flying can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach.

68.texto: "Oh, no-not you again?!" -Jaya Ballard, task mage

69.texto: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot. -Llanowar penalty for trespassing

70.descricao: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Scavenger Folk: Destroy target artifact.
70.texto: String, weapons, wax, or jewels-it makes no difference. Leave nothing unguarded in Scarwood.

71.descricao:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
71.texto: "We need not fear the forces of the air; I've yet to see a Spider without an appetite." -Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

72.texto: Asked how it survived a run-in with a bog imp, the pegasus just shook its mane and burped.

73.descricao:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
73.texto: "We called them 'armored lightning."' - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

74.descricao: {1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
74.texto: "Without combat medics, Icatia would probably not have withstood the forces of chaos as long as it did." -Sarpadian Empires, vol. VI

regras.texto: This is not modal. If the target changes from an artifact to an enchantment or vice versa, this still destroys it.

76.texto: "That does it! I'm going back to hunting chickens!" -Rhirhok, goblin archer

77.descricao:
Icatian Javelineers enters the battlefield with a javelin counter on it.

{T}, Remove a javelin counter from Icatian Javelineers: Icatian Javelineers deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

78.descricao: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
78.texto: "The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war." -Telim'Tor

regras.texto: An "attacking creature" is one that has been declared as an attacker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, or the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat.

79.descricao:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
79.texto: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

81.descricao: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
81.texto: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

82.descricao: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
82.texto: "We are to be bound together as the reeds of a basket." -Asmira, Rashida, and Jabari, unity chant

regras.texto: Warrior's Honor affects creatures you control that are on the battlefield at the time it resolves. If you put a creature onto the battlefield later in the turn, that creature won't get the bonus.

83.descricao: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
83.texto: "Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die." -Oracle en-Vec
